title: Long term employment

abstract: Having a steady job is always important. i wanted a career and long term employment.
description: Michael Farquhar walked into Brintons to leave his details at reception. The same day he had and interview and got a job. In his time there, he moved through many different areas and went through many life changes, from renting an appartment to marriage, owning a home and raising a family. When Brintons closed in 2008, Michael had worked there for 21 years. He talks about what it was like to work there, in the good and bad times.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001785; Geelong TCUFA : weaving and winding : more than a job : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
